hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Ice Arrows#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Why won't anyone acknowledge the housing crisis in Kakariko Village?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Prelude of Light#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Zora Scale# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #the Market#.
